mapper.sql: id, dev_id, name, code, caliber, material, geom, tpl_type_id, data_info, delete_flag, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, belong_to
mapper.select: select id, dev_id, name, code, caliber, material, st_astext(geom) geom, tpl_type_id, data_info, delete_flag, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at,belong_to from gis_dev_ext gdx where dev_id = #{devId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

select id, dev_id, tpl_type_id,data_info from gis_dev_ext gdx
delete_flag = FALSE
and dev_id in
#{item}
select sum(cast(data_info::jsonb->> #{val} as FLOAT)) totalLength from gis_dev_ext gdx where caliber is not null

SELECT t4.*, t5.name AS type_name, t5.p_id FROM ( SELECT id, dev_id, type_id , ST_AsText(st_transform(geom, 4326)) AS geom FROM ( SELECT t3.type_id, t2.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM gis_dev_ext t1 WHERE delete_flag = false AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT regexp_split_to_table(#{devIds}, ',') AS dev_id ) vir WHERE vir.dev_id = t1.dev_id ) ) t2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, type_id FROM share_dev sd ) t3 ON t2.dev_id = t3.id ) rs ) t4 LEFT JOIN share_dev_type t5 ON t4.type_id = t5.id

select dev_id,GeometryType(geom) as type,ST_AsText(st_transform(geom, 4326)) AS geom from gis_dev_ext gdx where data_info->>'address' like '%${val}%' or data_info->>'code' like '%${val}%' or data_info->>'address' like '%${val}%' or data_info->>'qdbm' like '%${val}%' or data_info->>'zdbm' like '%${val}%' AND delete_flag = false
select dev_id,GeometryType(geom) as type,ST_AsText(st_transform(geom, 4326)) AS geom from gis_dev_ext gdx where dev_id in (${devIds}) AND delete_flag = false

select dev_id,code,name,st_x(ST_Transform((geom),4326)) as x,st_y(st_astext(ST_Transform((geom),4326))) as y,belong_to from gis_dev_ext gdx WHERE caliber is null AND delete_flag = false
AND dev_id in #{devIds}
SELECT FROM gis_dev_ext gdx WHERE delete_flag = false AND code = #{code} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gis_dev_ext (dev_id, name, code, caliber, material, geom, tpl_type_id, data_info, create_by, create_at, belong_to) VALUES
( #{item.devId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.caliber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=GeomStrHandler}, #{item.tplTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dataInfo,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.belongTo,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM gis_dev_ext gdx WHERE delete_flag = false AND batch_number = #{batchNum}

SELECT code, dev_id FROM gis_dev_ext gdx WHERE delete_flag = false
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT regexp_split_to_table(#{codes},',') AS code) AS vir where vir.code = gdx.code)
SELECT st_astext(#{geom});
SELECT ST_GeomFromText(#{geom},#{srid})
SELECT st_x(#{geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=GeomStrHandler} ) as x,st_y(#{geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=GeomStrHandler}) as y;
mapper.update: UPDATE gis_dev_ext set delete_flag = TRUE where dev_id = #{devId}
mapper.select: SELECT ST_GeomFromText((SELECT ST_AsText(ST_Transform(geom,#{srid})) AS transformgeom FROM ST_GeomFromText(#{geom}, 4326) AS geom),#{srid})
mapper.insert:
insert into gis_dev_ext
id,
dev_id,
name,
code,
caliber,
material,
geom,
tpl_type_id,
data_info,
delete_flag,
create_by,
create_at,
update_by,
update_at,
belong_to,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{devId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{caliber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=GeomStrHandler},
#{tplTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{dataInfo,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{belongTo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update gis_dev_ext
dev_id = #{devId,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
caliber = #{caliber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
material = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
geom = #{geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=GeomStrHandler},
tpl_type_id = #{tplTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
data_info = #{dataInfo,jdbcType=OTHER},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
belong_to = #{belongTo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND((st_length( #{geom}))::NUMERIC,3)
